notes.note: Companions: Jade, Eve, Zeus, Hermes — roles: Jade (builder), Eve (reflection), Zeus (ops), Hermes (routing).
Civic Stack online: .gic registry (concept), Civic Ledger (mock + prod), GIC Gateway (feeds, posts).
Operational cycles: Clock-in/out; Eve logs Wins, Blocks, TomorrowIntent per cycle.
OAA Hub exposes dev surfaces: /dev/context, /dev/ledger, /dev/queue, /dev/reports — all DEV_MODE-gated.
Sentinel Suite: CI status + runtime vitals (BullMQ depth/fail%), webhook to Command Ledger, weekly digest.
Design doctrine: integrity-first learning; human+machine symbiosis; rewards via GIC for shared agreements.
